lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that with a little assistance anyone can further their state of existence. I also believe that it is my responsibility to assist those who are interested in self improvement.  It is also my Biblical duty to assist those in need. A combination of all of these is the reason that I am a supporter of Kiva.

I look forward to the wonderful things that are in store for Kiva, its partners and this Heartland team.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I help cook food to serve to customers

lenders.name: Marion & Floyd
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our love & abundance
lenders.occupational_info: Salesperson/Entrepreneur

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: God loves the poor and marginalized and asks us to do the same.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: I am trying to save money to launch a new website.  Loaning to others enables me to put my money to work rather than holding it somewhere that tempts me to spend it.  Additionally, I have myself spent years on the edge of poverty, have lost my home twice.  I know what it feels like to be there.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a web designer with several years of experience designing for myself.  I am beginning to look for clients for basic design and updating existing websites for optimum usability.  I do not yet have a professional website to direct viewers to.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I hope!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have experienced trauma.

lenders.name: Loretta
lenders.loan_because: I have received an abundance of blessings throughout my life and continue to receive them and I want to share my blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Human research protections

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I have hopes that everyone can be happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children and families who are experiencing mental illness, relationship problems, or behavioral problems.  Sometimes I prescribe medication to the patients if if will help.

lenders.name: Kory
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people, but I don't feel that serving food at the soup kitchen helps anyone. I know that the same people are just going to be back tomorrow, and the next day, and the next - expecting food for free and doing nothing to help themselves get out of their rut. With Kiva I feel that I'm giving industrious people a well earned and essential opportunity to thrive and build the economy in  their own communities.

lenders.name: Augusta
lenders.loan_because:
as a Christian my husband and I feel called to be the hands and feet of Christ. We feel blessed so we want to be a blessing to others.  
And we loan because it is one of the many simple and easy things people can do to be part of the solution to help others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I dispense medicine to the people who are sick or who needs medication in order  to stay healthy.  I help educate them how to take care of their medical needs.

lenders.name: katie
lenders.loan_because: "the world owes me nothing, and we owe each other the world."

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: it doesn't take much to make a tremendous difference to someone's life.

lenders.name: Vito
lenders.loan_because: During a vacation to the Dominican Republic I took a tour of villages away from the vacation spots and met wonderful hard working people struggling to have a good life. It opened my eyes to how privileged I am and gave me a strong desire to help others.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to be in my position in a first world country.

lenders.name: raleigh
lenders.occupational_info: I manage all daily operations of a website providing information to those interested in outdoor activities such as hiking, climbing, and paddling; I also manage all online sales for the same outdoor and travel outfitter.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in need gives me the most satisfaction in emotionally and spiritually.
lenders.occupational_info: I create Automation scripts for testing Web pages and applications.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: People need capitol to get ahead, to improve their health, education and general living conditions. As they do so they bring their family, neighbors and country up with them.
lenders.occupational_info: Respond to medical emergencies or injuries on the street, in public places, in people's homes or their place of business. Evaluate and treat people including providing IVs, medications and other medical care. Provide emotional care and support to patients and there family and friends when critically ill, dead or dying.

lenders.name: Laurel & Milton
lenders.loan_because: It is good to help other people succeed. We both have been helped by others and want to pass on the goodness that has come to us.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels to have hopes and dreams and ambition that might have been extinguished without a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Internet Sales Manager at a Lexus Dealership in Georgia.

lenders.name: Col
lenders.loan_because: I believe that success is often than not, a combination of hard work, determination, having a dream and also a little bit of luck..

lenders.name: Cheng
lenders.loan_because: 1. someone has forgiven the humongous debt that i owe. 2. I don't have $25,000; i don't have $2,500; I don't have $250, but i have $25! (graciously given by my friend, who introduced me to kiva!)
lenders.occupational_info: hm... i learn things that I'm not good at (yet) and hope that I'll be better at it. :p

lenders.name: Pieter
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with much, and wish to help others with lesser opportunities
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee a cement manufacturing plant in the remote town of Dwaalboom, looking after all aspects of such an operation including production, maintenance, human resources, logistics.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I received Kiva credit from my grandmother for christmas.  It turns out that it was a very cool gift to receive. :)

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: it is the least I can do
lenders.occupational_info: Aviation

lenders.name: Riley K.
lenders.loan_because: i want to help others in need!!

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: A helping hand is always a good thing.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I want to improve the chance of success for small business owners.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying how people deal with natural hazards, and ways that disaster mitigation and relief can be improved and made more equitable.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: $25 making a difference in anyone's life, that's a remarkable task.  It makes me feel like I can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mom right now (finally graduated from college though).  My mom has breast cancer, so I'm helping her to treatment also.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy participating with those who are willing to work to improve their lifestyle and community.
lenders.occupational_info: Wholesaler of equipment for the building of water features-water gardens,  koi ponds, waterfalls, Architectural fountains

lenders.name: Mishele
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for my own good fortune as a professional woman, and believe in helping other professional women around the world.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Profit is for punks
lenders.occupational_info: Prosperity is for everyone regardless of age, race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or geography.

lenders.name: Laurie-Ann
lenders.loan_because: It's a very small sacrifice for me and huge advantage for someone else!!
lenders.occupational_info: Jail guard

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: Hard  to find a better investment than helping change lives.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because:
By luck of birth I live a fortunate existence and believe that Karma demands I give back in as many opportunities as possible. 

In this abundant life I seek to remember and aspire to adhere to the tenet: Live simply so that others may simply live.
lenders.occupational_info:
I perform; I teach kindergarten; I teach college; I volunteer. 

My workday is joyfully spent in the company of my favorite age group: kinderkids (5-6 year olds.) I genuinely believe I can teach deep concepts regarding compassion and true global citizenship via the wisdom of Kiva. 

I choose to use Kiva to teach my kinderkids about the world and they are equal partners in making my donation decisions this year. 

Thank you Kiva for inspiring some of my most dynamic lessons as we weave math (tallying our votes) to discussions about gender equity (should we support a man or woman this month?) to finding our reading sight words in the printed text of lender's stories.  

My kids, my families, my principal and I are impressed by the knowledge imbedded within these lessons.  

THANK YOU KIVA for all you do... Kevin G. Gallagher

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in empowering people to change their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist who brings insight,joy and transformation to those who view or purchase my artwork

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I know that every little bit counts.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small company that specializes in ICF (Insulated Concrete Form) building. My company is rated as one of the top builders in our field.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: If not me, who?

lenders.name: Alissa
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves. Everyone should be able to reach for their goals.

lenders.name: Cale
lenders.loan_because: It's helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to high school.

lenders.name: Sonia
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I like to know that the money I give to someone reaches them, and I hope, is able to help them expand their business and their lives.

lenders.name: Dave & Erin
lenders.loan_because: We want to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Erin is a teacher.  Dave is a communicator.

lenders.name: Bonny
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I inspect construction sites for water quality protective measures enforceable by law.  I am also a musician.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Amrit
lenders.loan_because: I want to help ... its my nature.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for all that is related in a skilled nursing facility that takes care of the elderly population of our community.

lenders.name: Cenk
lenders.loan_because: Microloans make the right impact for enterprising citizens of the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to figure out how white blood cells work.

lenders.name: Scott & Erin
lenders.loan_because: We live a wonderful life by the chance of location and the opportunities we've had.  We are able to eat the foods we want and to go and experience life via the arts, museums, books, incredible natural settings, etc., and would like to help others to be able to rise up from the most basic levels of survival and subsistence, as in the end we are all living here together.
lenders.occupational_info: We run our family business, which is a 60 year old feed mill and retail store.  We do everything from supplying farmers with their animal feed needs to supplying others with their pet animals' feed and supplies.

lenders.name: Brendan
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: It just makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy using my bicycle for pleasure rides and as a means to get around and advocating cycling as a viable, if not essential means of transportation.

lenders.name: Little Green Bags
lenders.occupation: Founder of Little Green Bags™ Limited
lenders.loan_because:
Reaching out with love and empowering one another to be greater than we know ourselves to be creates an entire new world of possibility. A possibility to live a life that is extraordinary beyond measure simply because we say so.

"Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It's not just in some of us; it's in everyone. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others." ~Marianne Williamson
lenders.occupational_info: I believe in sharing our vision, giving back to the community, and replenishing the Earths natural resources. As an advocate for and producer of innovative Earth-friendly textile products, Ive created a company that proudly promotes the responsible use of resources that protect and enhance the environment. We offer an opportunity and a voice to those who are economically disempowered and impoverished. ~Michelle Nadon, Founder

lenders.name: Kayla
lenders.loan_because: It helps others who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a waitress part time and go to college full time for dental hygiene.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: It's not charity.  It's a loan.  Loans command responsibility. We all gain when each of us is given a chance to enhance our own lives - and then encourage others to grow.  Hopefully, an unending circle.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometimes.

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: This was a gift and I am passing it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university and help manage the financial policies.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I work at a small business and know how helpful loans can be.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computers do useful things.

lenders.loan_because: We like to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Tony is a CAD/CAM operator who designs prefabricated stairways while I'm a homemaker.

lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people get financial backing in a very efficient and cost effective way.  What a way to make your money work!

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: i loan because giving to most charities only provides temporary relief to a need. i want to see God's world changed by compassion, but there are very  few ways to bring about permanent change and kiva is one of them.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm only a student right now.

lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I go to a government building to be taught the ideas the government wants me to know.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in changing lives with a small gesture..I believe in empowering people by believing in them..allowing them the opportunity to create a better life for themselves, thus for their family, community, nation...and so on...
lenders.occupational_info: I am the director of a women's shelter. A place where we offer food, shelter, clothing for the homeless women or women living in poverty. Part of my role is to ensure that we receive enough funding to continue our important work within the community and continue helping the women in need.

lenders.occupational_info: I work at an animal hospital and assist the veterinarian in caring for patients.

lenders.occupational_info: I throw events that are based upon electronic music and fashion.

lenders.occupational_info: JaNel stays home to teach Jackson (7), Elise (4), Aimee (3), and Leo (4 months). Paul is an editor for a magazine. We love learning about people all over the world.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others who are are in need of financial help to get them on the road of prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell just about anything. Buying on auctions, private ads and then after refurbishing or cleaning the item, I resell to the end user.

lenders.loan_because: We got the help when we needed it - it's time for us to help other in need

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I really like helping people

lenders.name: yolanda
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to help another individual become successful in their endeavor to be self-employed. We are all part of the human race and, if you can,  it is important to help one another reach personal goals no matter where you live in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find a property that will fit their needs and price range that they can purchase as a place to call 'home', or to own as an investment.

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves and their families.  We're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info:
I take care of my kids and my dog, hug my girlfriend, and sometimes work on computers.

My profile pic is my mom at the age of 12 or 13.  Happy Mothers Day!

lenders.name: Raychel
lenders.loan_because: I can help other people right from my own home. How cool is that?

lenders.name: Zack
lenders.loan_because: It has an impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Pittsburgh and am also joining the Peace Corps (leaving for Africa in July).

lenders.name: Bob and Regina

lenders.name: Kevin and Amanda Conlin
lenders.loan_because: because we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help run the apartments on a college campus by helping residents get academic support, meet other people in their communities, and help them to rectify any neighbor disagreements which may arise.  Amanda currently works at a jewelry store.  She just graduated from university in the subject area of hospitality management and would eventually like to pursue a career in event planning.

lenders.name: Jes
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference. I feel that a life spent without helping anyone you don't even know is a life wasted. That's why I loan

Darren works in natural resource management (surface water resources, altered hydrology and impacts).  
Teresa is a Barrister in Perth.

lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do if you can...

lenders.loan_because: We want to help those who are trying to help themselves by providing access to capital.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people get out of poverty and improve their living conditions.  I would like to encourage everyone throughout the world to read "Up from Slavery" by Booker T. Washington.  You can read it on the internet.  It shows a path out of poverty that applies to people of all cultures and backgrounds.  Develop your skills, don't drink or do drugs, and live simply and hopefully poverty will be a thing of the past soon.  mg

lenders.occupational_info: I Strive to Educate people that it's better to give to the needy than to take and be greedy, our actions here on Earth will eventually be Judged by God the Almighty, Life on Earth is Short, Eternity is Forever, what's ahead for YOU Depends on What you do Today.

lenders.occupational_info: We are students in our local schools and our local scout troop. We know that we can do a lot to bring about some good things in this world.

lenders.name: Kressa
lenders.loan_because: There is no better feeling in the world than being there for other people who need some help.  I have had so many people help me, when I needed it, Its my turn to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small store that I sell furniture out of.  Most of the furniture is used, but in good condition.  I also show horses in jumping competitions for a hobby

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I feel it is important to help others to improve their lives and the lives around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a grocery store putting peoples items into bags, sweep the floors, and get carts from the parking lot.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.occupation: food writer and thrift store employee
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the innate dignity of every human person.
lenders.occupational_info: Ecclectic!

lenders.name: Holy Cows of Ann Arbor
lenders.occupational_info: The Holy Cows is the outgrowth of a class taken at the Unitarian Universalist Congregation in Ann Arbor seven years ago.  We have stayed together as a group, we meet monthly and go away for a couple of weekends together each year. We are a multi-generational group of women encouraging each other, supporting each other and seeking to help others.  We celebrate, laugh and cry together.  We push each other to follow our dreams.  KIVA provides us with an exciting opportunity for us to help very directly and that feels very good to us.

lenders.name: Ashton
lenders.loan_because: It helps to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: Efficiency in urban planning and design

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: Altruism aside, it's actually a lot of fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a mineral prospecting company. We send people around the world to look for metals in the ground. I help design the survey equipment.

lenders.name: Gretchen
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful I live in a country with opportunities to improve my life, and want to share that opportunity with other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others take care of the land and air so it will be safe for people many years from now.

lenders.name: Chris M
lenders.loan_because: "If we each do a little, then we've all done a lot." (I can't believe I just came up with that.)
lenders.occupational_info: I work in software maintenance and enjoy writing.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people--I own my own business but I had to completely start it up and establish it myself on an extremely limited budget. I think if people had access to easier forms of capital more people would be able to raise their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: My company produces custom written content for academic and professional purposes in English.

lenders.name: lynn
lenders.loan_because: it is such an easy way to give.  A $25 investment is nothing for us and goes so far.

lenders.name: Betsy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I am loaning on behalf of Carlé Highschool. This loan is part of our student's effort to improve the community of the entire world.

lenders.name: Bill Bittner
lenders.loan_because: I recognize God within every one of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a husband and stepfather, designer and multimedia producer, and recently unemployed. I grew up and live in PIttsburgh, PA, USA with my wife, sheltie, and 5 cats. I design websites, videos, animations, ads, logos, and brochures

lenders.name: SENIVAL  FELISBELO
lenders.loan_because: Quero desenvolver um site, com uma agenda online, idéia própria, muito funcional, uso a 7 anos e vou colocar na Web para todos, com patrocínio de todos. obrigado.
lenders.occupational_info: Acreditando nas pessoas, orientando elas como utilizar bem o tempo, de forma que a agenda seria muito útil e de forma simplificada a todos.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help these people succeed and bring a little happiness to their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: General Contractor Commercial Interiors

lenders.loan_because: i want to help
lenders.occupational_info: dental hygienist

lenders.name: Kammie
lenders.loan_because: I live in a country full of poverty that I see on a daily basis.  I love being able to help others help themselves, which is exactly what KIVA does!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in an international school in Guatemala.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: in my view the ultimate test of how we lived our lives is how we helped others to live theirs.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialise in all aspects of public affairs and public relations in the Republic of Ireland

lenders.loan_because: What an amazing idea.   How could I not do this??

lenders.name: Daniel and friends

lenders.occupational_info: It is a way of people recognize the periphery of Brazilian musicians and see that they have potential and are not criminals as the bourgeoisie points

lenders.name: Margo
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have been born into circumstances that have allowed me to provide a stable life for myself and my son. There's nothing that would give me greater joy than to allow others to do the same for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a history teacher at a high school in the midwest.

lenders.loan_because: This seems to be very good option to help out people in need.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: i want to 'pay it forward'... to give back what has been given to me. i want to share my faith in the human spirit.

lenders.name: Global Resource Cycle
lenders.loan_because: My partner and I support Kiva's mission to contribute to  underdeveloped communities both locally and globally in order to promote economic sustainability.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a nonprofit organization aimed at educating communities to sustain themselves and improve their quality of living, thereby increasing their opportunities to grow.

lenders.name: Mike, Amy and girls
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Because we want to make a difference in the lives of others who may not be as fortunate.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: It is the merest accident where we start out and what resources we have available to us.  I started out by loaning in Peru in honor of my now late friend, Kent C. Day, who was once an archaeologist there.  I have lent money to a group that bears my mother's name in Bolivia, and a coffin maker in Peru, in honor of my now late father, Gordon.  Otherwise, I try to lend to women in Africa, where I think the money is able to do the most good.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach philosophy to college students, while learning it myself.

lenders.name: Kira & Chris
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Kira is a doctoral student at an American university. Chris works with computers.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: It will help.
lenders.occupational_info: I follow law changes that may affect my company's ability to sell its services.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: People have given me opportunities in my life, and I deeply believe that as a global community we need to pass on those opportunities to everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I help ensure the organization I work for keeps its employees, their health and wellbeing in mind in everything that they do.

lenders.name: marien

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It means so much to help others when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise several insurance claim adjusters

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.occupational_info: I help lawyers.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by Muhammad Yunus and the concept of the microloan just makes so much sense.  The vast majority of people don't need millions of dollars, they need hundreds or thousands and if we work together, we can provide that.  I love that I can participate in a Nobel Peace Prize winning concept that has immediate and visible results.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a reference librarian in a busy, urban public library.  I provide answers, information literacy instruction, and computer support in person, by phone, email and chat.
